title: Frontend Developer
description: Join our growing frontend team to create interactive, accessible, and performance-optimized web applications using React.js and Tailwind CSS. Collaborate with designers and backend engineers to ship features quickly.

title: Full Stack Engineer
description: We’re looking for a Full Stack Engineer to develop modern web applications using Node.js, React, and PostgreSQL. You'll be responsible for building new features and maintaining critical systems.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: As a UI/UX designer, you’ll be responsible for creating intuitive, user-centered designs for both desktop and mobile platforms. Experience with Figma and design systems is a must.

title: Backend Developer
description: We're looking for a backend developer with experience in building scalable APIs and working with microservices. Proficiency in Python or Node.js is required, along with cloud experience.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Looking for a DevOps Engineer to streamline our CI/CD pipelines, manage Kubernetes clusters, and automate deployments across staging and production environments.

title: Product Manager
description: As a Product Manager, you will define product roadmaps, coordinate with cross-functional teams, and ensure timely delivery of features. Strong communication skills and a user-focused mindset are essential.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: We are hiring a mobile app developer to work on both Android and iOS platforms using Flutter. You will contribute to new feature development and improve existing performance and UX.

title: QA Engineer
description: We need a QA Engineer to design test cases, automate regression suites, and ensure quality across our frontend and backend applications. Experience with Selenium or Cypress is a bonus.
